name: SutraLite
overview:
SutraLite is a unique low-cost recruitment service that provides unmatchable value for money solutions to any cost cautious company or startup. SutraLite is the ideal solution for startups and small/medium-sized businesses that are looking to hire efficiently at a low-cost.

It is synonymous with startup recruitment, and hundreds of small and medium-sized businesses happily use their services too. SutraLite works with founders, hiring managers, and decision makers of organizations, allowing them to find that elusive, ideal employee at a low-cost.

offices.address1: 601 B, Annapurna, Above Mumbai Darbar Hotel,

external_links.title: SutraLite: Affordable SaaS Based Recruitment & HR Solutions for Startups and Small Businesses
